mapper.select: select u.userIdx, c.campIdx, c.facltNm, c.firstImageUrl, c.campImg2, b.bookIdx, b.bookCheckInDate, b.bookCheckOutDate, b.bookSelectedZone, b.bookAdultCount, b.bookYouthCount, b.bookChildCount, b.bookCarCount from pjbook b left join pjcamp c on b.campIdx = c.campIdx left join pjuser u on b.userIdx = u.userIdx where u.userIdx = #{userIdx}
